conbody.p: A scenario is a what-if model. It allows you to explore and calculate different future situations (scenarios) without changing values in the worksheet. It is particularly useful for answering what-if questions in the field of economics and management.

Excel's scenario manager enables you to create and save sets of different input values that produce different calculated results (such as Most Positive, Most Negative). You can easily compare the results in a generated summary report. Other what-if analysis tools such as Goal Seek and Solver, don't have this.
